Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $12,500. This price is inclusive of all the latest updates and includes a comprehensive warranty package. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
